text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with grilled shrimp with preserved
lemon aioli so easy so simple and yes
another use for those cured lemons we
made and at the same time a really
simple super easy shrimp recipe for your
summertime grilling all right i'm gonna
take a couple of our cured lemons out of
the jar and i'm gonna give them a little
soak just to get a little bit of that
brian off them of course the longer you
soak them the more you rinse them the
less intense the flavor so I only did
mine for about 10 minutes I'm gonna
mince those up super fine so I probably
have I don't know about a tablespoon and
a half I'd say I'm gonna combine that
with a half a cup of mayonnaise of
course you can use freshly made and then
a tablespoon of chopped tarragon which
is just about my favorite grilled
seafood herb just wonderful with seafood
I'm also gonna squeeze in about a
teaspoon of fresh lemon juice alright
we're gonna set that aside let that
chill while we prep our shrimp I'm gonna
take one pound of peeled and deveined
pink shrimp those are like the sixteen
to a pound size little drizzle of olive
oil a little bit of smoked paprika and a
little bit of salt and we're gonna mix
that up and I know what you're thinking
what else you gonna put in there chef
Jon nothing because I don't need
anything else
the oil the smoked paprika and the salt
is all you need because it just
accentuates the natural sweetness of the
shrimp I'm gonna throw this on a hot
grill literally two minutes per side and
you're probably wondering why aren't
those on skewers come on chef Jon would
you get lazy no if I'm only gonna grill
a pound of shrimp for just my wife and I
I'm not gonna spend time securing them
I'm just gonna grill them I mean how
hard is it you put them on the grill you
turn them once and you take them off
come on scuri ins a lot about
presentation it looks nice to put a
skier on a plate but really not
necessary in my opinion and that's it
grilled shrimp beautiful sweet smoky
charred around the edges caramelized
dipped in that beautiful cured lemon
aioli what a great combination and of
course if you don't have cured lemons
you can just use a little lemon zest use
the same recipe it's going
be delicious so there you go a simple
easy recipe for those summer of Ameena
barbecues and if you have no idea what
summer of Amina means you'll have to go
back and watch the old videos give it a
try I think you're gonna love it
and you know had like two ingredients
come out it can't be that go this I get
all the ingredients and as always enjoy
